name: entertainment
content:

B1 shows, films, television, or other performances or activities that entertain people, or a performance of this type: There's not much in the way of entertainment in this town - just the cinema and a couple of pubs.formal This season's entertainments include five new plays and several concerts of Chinese and Indian music. Synonym
amusement
More examplesFewer examplesThis film is good family entertainment .I thought there was some in-flight entertainment on the Heathrow-New York flight.They lay on free entertainment at the club every day.What did you do for entertainment while you were staying there - just watch TV?Stars of the entertainment world turned out to celebrate his 40th year in show business.
